# sapkgs/utap

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the `utap` application is to demonstrate how to perform unit tests for Shiny utility functions with [`testthat`](https://testthat.r-lib.org/).

## Installation

``` r
install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github('mjfrigaard/sapkgs')
```

# R files

```{r}
#| echo: false
fs::dir_tree("R/")
```

# Unit tests 

```{r}
#| echo: false
fs::dir_tree(
  "tests/testthat/", 
  regexp = "^tests/testthat/test-")
```
